snippet: Criminal charges against two former traders for JPMorgan Chase intensify scrutiny of the bank’s executives. | Eike Batista has taken further steps to dismantle his business empire. | John A. Paulson has bought the company that makes his favorite...
abstract: Criminal charges against two former traders for JPMorgan Chase intensify scrutiny of the bank’s executives. | Eike Batista has taken further steps to dismantle his business empire. | John A. Paulson has bought the company that makes his favorite pianos. | The reinsurance arm of Third Point is expected to begin trading.
